EmailTemplate.subject: Your Invitation: DBS Hack2Hire is back
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
**DBS Hack2Hire 2019 Singapore** Hack your way to a dream job And design the future
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Calling all technologists! The DBS Hack2Hire is back and this time, DBS & Pivotal, offer you a challenge to invent the future of banking. It's your chance to hack away with some of the brightest minds, create, learn and experience the power of technology to solve real-world challenges.
How HACK2HIRE Works? 1. Take the test Test your abilities through our tech assessment challenge on HackerRank (to be taken on a computer). Deadline: 1st March, 11:59pm (GMT +8)
2. Get shortlisted Shortlisted candidates will be invited to join the live Hack2Hire hackathon (in person) held in Singapore.
3. Hack a job Code your way into a job at the Hack2Hire Hackathon. Hackathon: 9 -10 March 2019
APPLY NOW: https://go.dbs.com/2FN1Ph0
Come join us to create the bank of the future!
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
